issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I´ve added other Builds of Mobile-SDK in my c:\ProgramData\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\ folder, (1.7.1 / 1.7.3 / 1.8.0)

Before update to the 1.0.4 build of ti-studio, i can select every version inside this mobilesdk\win32 folder

After titanium studio update, only the version c:\ProgramData\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\1.7.2\ is selctable from tiampp.xml and "new Project" dialog.

I already removed the build folder and also cleaned my project... but this dont help!

Only a sidenote: I need these other version, because it looks like there is problem with the "CommonJS" "require" in 1.7.2 (i´ll add a new ticket for this!)
fields.summary: After Studio 1.0.4 update - Only SDK 1.7.2 in tiapp.xml nor new Project dialog selectable!
fields.environment:
Windows Vista

Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535
Build: jenkins-titanium-rcp-master-40 (origin/master)
Date: 10 August 2011, 15:39:05

comments.body:
Andreas

Did you manage to overcome this issue, or is it still evident?

Cheers
Andreas. if the issue described still exists, please reopen this ticket. Thanks
Ticket resolved and not updated since last curator action.
